title: Update a Driver Qualification File
description: A driver's medical certificate is about to expire. A compliance manager must get the new certificate and update their file.

tasks.description: Receive a system alert that a driver's medical card expires in 30 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is notified of the pending expiration.

tasks.description: Send an automated notification to the driver reminding them to renew their medical certificate.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver is reminded of the requirement.

tasks.description: The driver uploads a photo of their new medical card.
Update the driver's qualification file with the new medical card and its expiration date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver's file is now up-to-date and compliant.
